name: Absolutely Authentic Streaming Experience
description:
Ever dreamt of running a successful streaming channel ? 

Entertaining a vibrant community and sharing beautiful moments with your viewers ?

Then, this game is not for you.

Disclaimer : This game is intended as a (rather poorly made) parody. I don't and never had any intent to offend or criticize anyone, especially the streaming community. The game itself is full of cliches, offensive language, terrible puns and dead memes. Warning given. 

Tools used

  • Engine : Unity 2019.3.10f
  • Sprites : Aseprite
  • Audio : Bfxr, Audacity & good ol' google translate voice generator
  • Music : Abundant Music
